suggestions.name: Icelandic Skyr with Berry Compote
suggestions.description: Protein-rich Icelandic skyr topped with a warm berry compote and crunchy seeds for a satisfying afternoon snack.
instructions: In a small saucepan, heat frozen berries with cinnamon over medium heat for 3-4 minutes until they break down into a compote
Add lemon zest to the warm compote and stir
Place skyr in a bowl and top with the warm berry compote
Sprinkle with pumpkin seeds for crunch

suggestions.name: Spanish Yogurt Gazpacho with Berry Swirl
suggestions.description: A refreshing cold yogurt soup with cucumber, herbs and a berry swirl - perfect for a warm afternoon.
instructions: Blend yogurt, diced cucumber, 4 mint leaves, and a pinch of salt until smooth
In a separate container, mash strawberries with a fork
Pour the yogurt mixture into a glass
Garnish with remaining mint leaf and chopped almonds

suggestions.name: German Quark Berry Mousse
suggestions.description: A light, whipped German-style quark cheese mousse with fresh berries and a hint of lemon - both satisfying and refreshing.
instructions: In a bowl, whip quark cheese with a fork until light and fluffy
Add lemon juice, stevia, and vanilla bean paste to the quark and mix well
Gently fold in half of the berries
Transfer to a serving cup and top with remaining berries
Chill for 5 minutes before serving for best texture
